data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 1, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Juarez.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Juarez.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Juarez in the half of Queretaro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
Free kick Queretaro.
In the minute 13, Queretaro's Kevin Ramirez misses with an attempt on goal.
Fernando Guerrero awards Juarez a goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Queretaro's Fernando Madrigal is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Juarez close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 38, Fernando Guerrero signals a Juarez throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 40, Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Juarez to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Juarez throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
The second-half is now underway.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 47, Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) is making a first substitution, with Martin Luis Galvan replacing Victor Omar Manon.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Francisco Contreras is booked for the home team.
Fernando Guerrero awards Juarez a goal kick.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Juarez in the half of Queretaro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Queretaro.
In the minute 55, Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Queretaro are coming forward and Hugo Silveira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 60, Queretaro needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Free kick Juarez.
In the minute 64, Javier Ibarra (Queretaro) has received a first yellow card.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 66, Francisco Rivera is on a sub for Fernando Madrigal for Queretaro.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 67, Alan Mendoza (Juarez) has received a yellow card from Fernando Guerrero.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Juarez.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Juarez just outside Queretaro's area.
In the minute 74, Queretaro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juarez.
The home team have replaced Flavio Santos with Carlos Rosel. This is the second substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
William Mendieta is replacing Francisco Contreras for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Juarez are pushing forward but Alan Mendoza's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Free kick Queretaro.
Juarez are down to 10 men after Jose Jaoquin Esquivel has been shown a red card.
In the minute 78, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Martin Rea for Queretaro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 81, Goal! Dario Lezcano gives Juarez a 1-0 lead.
William Mendieta with an assist there.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 83, Queretaro make their second substitution with Sebastian Sosa replacing Hugo Silveira.
Hector Altamirano is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez with David Zepeda replacing Javier Ibarra.
Martin Rea returns to the field for Queretaro after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 84, Can Juarez capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Juarez's Gustavo Velazquez breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Juarez have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Juarez.
Fernando Guerrero awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Queretaro push upfield but Fernando Guerrero quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
